titleStmt.title: The hunting of the fox: or, Flattery displayed The flatterers devise; a water-man looking one way, and rowing another, with this motto mel in ore, fel in corde. By H. H. Grayens.
Hunting of the fox.
titleStmt.author: Harflete, Henry, fl. 1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. M[athewes] for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredeth, at the signe of the Golden Lyon in Paules Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
